TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkDataBindingHandler extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler

summary.span: 提供超链接属性的数据绑定处理程序。

span.span: Provides a data-binding handler for a hyperlink property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，它派生`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`类。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它解析为设计时数据绑定`CustomHyperLink`类使用方法。It resolves design-time data binding for the `CustomHyperLink` class using the method. MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBindControl(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
public: override void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

span.span: The for the document that contains the control.

summary.span: 为指定控件解析设计时数据绑定。

span.span: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定是否并的属性控制是在数据绑定。This method determines whether the and properties of the control are data-bound. 如果属性是数据绑定，此方法设置为"数据绑定"属性的值。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound". 如果属性为数据绑定，此方法： 将属性的值设置为文本字符串，因此控件将具有工作超链接的外观。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，它派生`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`类。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它解析为设计时数据绑定属性的`CustomHyperLink`类，以便当它是数据绑定在设计时，将占位符文本显示的属性。It resolves design-time data binding for the property of the `CustomHyperLink` class so that placeholder text is displayed for the property when it is data-bound at design time. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#2)]
